question: The "Cotopaxi National Park" is located in which country?
explanation: Cotopaxi National Park is an IUCN Category II national park located in Cotopaxi, Napo and Pichincha provinces of Ecuador. This national park houses volcanos such as Cotopaxi (active); Ruminawi (dormant) and Sincholagua (dormant). Cotopaxi Volcano is one of the highest active volcanos in the world.
